blogPost.excerpt: Rolley Scooterson is an award-winning intelligent electric scooter, easy-to-ride, energy-efficient, and fully controlled from your smartphone. With its AI-powered algorithms, Scooterson's app makes riding Rolley seamless and effortless.
blogPost.body: Rolley Scooterson is an award-winning intelligent electric scooter, easy-to-ride, energy-efficient, and fully controlled from your smartphone. With its AI-powered algorithms, Scooterson's app makes riding Rolley seamless and effortless.
blogPost.title: Rolley Scooterson - Intelligent electric scooter controlled from your smartphone
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 罗利滑板车是一款屡获殊荣的智能电动滑板车，易于驾驶，节能，完全可以通过智能手机进行控制。凭借其人工智能驱动的算法，斯库特森的应用程序使骑滚轮变得无缝和毫不费力。
localize.tagline: 智能手机控制的智能电动滑板车

localize.description: 羅利滑板車是一款屢獲殊榮的智能電動滑板車，易於駕駛，節能，完全可以通過智能手機進行控制。憑藉其人工智能驅動的算法，斯庫特森的應用程序使騎滾輪變得無縫和毫不費力。
localize.tagline: 智能手機控制的智能電動滑板車

previous.excerpt: InCharge X is the world's only 100W 6-in-1 keyring cable. Thanks to its 6 charging combinations, you can charge almost any device at super high speed. Available in a 5 foot long version, too!
previous.title: InCharge X - The 100W Swiss Army knife of cables

localize.description: InCharge X是世界上唯一的100W 6合1钥匙扣电缆。多亏了它的6种充电组合，你几乎可以在超高速下给任何设备充电。也有5英尺长的版本可供选择！
InCharge X是世界上唯一的100W 6合1鑰匙扣電纜。多虧了它的6種充電組合，你幾乎可以在超高速下給任何設備充電。也有5英尺長的版本可供選擇！

next.excerpt: Are you lazy? Don’t have time for Linkedin? Meet Linvo. Linvo allows you to grow your network faster to achieve your goals more quickly. Instead of getting five connections every day and five messages. You get 80 connections every day and 80 messages.
next.title: Linvo - Get more leads and sales on Linkedin

localize.description: 你懒惰吗？没有时间玩LinkedIn吗？见见林沃。Linvo使您可以更快地扩展网络，从而更快地实现目标。而不是每天收到五个连接和五条消息。你每天都会收到80个连接和80条消息。
localize.tagline: 在LinkedIn上获取更多线索和销售

localize.description: 你懶惰嗎？沒有時間玩LinkedIn嗎？見見林沃。Linvo使您可以更快地擴展網絡，從而更快地實現目標。而不是每天收到五個連接和五條消息。你每天都會收到80個連接和80條消息。
localize.tagline: 在LinkedIn上獲取更多線索和銷售
